A warning to all such who are making a profession of God, Christ, and the Scriptures and yet are in their blind zeal, persecuting of those who are in the life of what they in words profess. By Christian Web. Web, Christian, 1678.
8 p.
printed for Thomas Simmons at the Bull and Mouth near Aldersgate, London : 1659.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
